IHM_MAIN.src.controller

Class PersonController

  • java.lang.Object
    • IHM_MAIN.src.controller.PersonController

  • public class PersonController
extends java.lang.Object
    PersonController is the controller for the Profile window.
    It implements utility methods to handle the displaying of a given User, and if possible, the modification of the profile.
